alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 1:09PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jefferson, northwestern Taylor and western Madison Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 109 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles east of Woodville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Goose Pasture, Hells Half Acre, Iddo, Moseley Hall, Ebb, Lamont, Hopewell, Aucilla, Eridu, Cabbage Grove, Thomas City, Wacissa Springs, Sirmans and Fanlew. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for Big Bend of Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Madison
